scripts.start: rm -rf .parcel-cache dist && npm run static && npx parcel build src/index.html && npx parcel src/index.html
scripts.build: npm run static && npx parcel build src/index.html
scripts.startup: mkdir src src/scss src/js src/css src/data src/assets
scripts.devinstall: npm install -D parcel gulp sass http-server
scripts.dev: npm run static && npx parcel src/index.html
scripts.git: git add . && git push -u origin main
